mapper.sql: BEIPIAOINFO_ID, BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, PUBLISHER_NAME, BEIPIAOINFO_VIDEO, BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME, BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME, BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_USER, BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_USER, BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS, BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER, BEIPIAOINFO_SHOWTYPE
mapper.select: SELECT A.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, A.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, A.PUBLISHER_NAME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_USER, A.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS, A.BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER, A.BEIPIAOINFO_SHOWTYPE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_CONTENT FROM bp_info A LEFT JOIN ccp_advert_recommend as car on A.BEIPIAOINFO_ID = car.advert_url where car.advert_type = #{advertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by car.advert_sort

SELECT A.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, A.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, A.PUBLISHER_NAME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME, A.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_USER, A.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS, A.BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER, A.BEIPIAOINFO_SHOWTYPE, A.BEIPIAOINFO_CONTENT FROM BP_INFO A LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG B ON A.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG=B.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BIT.TAG_ID = B.TAG_PARENT_ID WHERE BIT.TAG_CODE = #{tagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS!='2' AND A.BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER!='0' ORDER BY BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER ASC
limit 0,3

SELECT BI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_IMAGES, BIT.TAG_CODE AS BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_VIDEO, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_SHOWTYPE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_USER, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CONTENT, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_DETAILS, PBIT.TAG_NAME AS PARENT_INFO FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS PBIT ON PBIT.TAG_ID = BIT.TAG_PARENT_ID WHERE BEIPIAOINFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT PBI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, PBI.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, PBI.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE FROM BP_INFO PBI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG PBIT ON PBI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = PBIT.TAG_ID WHERE PBI.BEIPIAOINFO_NUMBER != '0' AND PBIT.TAG_PARENT_ID = (SELECT BIT.TAG_PARENT_ID FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID WHERE BI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT BIT.TAG_NAME AS BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, PBIT.TAG_NAME AS PARENT_INFO FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS PBIT ON BIT.TAG_PARENT_ID = PBIT.TAG_ID WHERE BI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT BI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CONTENT FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID WHERE BIT.TAG_CODE = #{infoTagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BI.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS = 1 order by BI.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME DESC
limit ${firstResult},${rows}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID WHERE BIT.TAG_CODE = #{infoTagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BI.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS = 1

SELECT BI.BEIPIAOINFO_ID, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TITLE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_HOMEPAGE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_IMAGES, BIT.TAG_CODE AS BEIPIAOINFO_TAG, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_VIDEO, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_SHOWTYPE, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_USER, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CONTENT, BI.BEIPIAOINFO_DETAILS, PBIT.TAG_NAME AS PARENT_INFO FROM BP_INFO AS BI LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS BIT ON BI.BEIPIAOINFO_TAG = BIT.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN BP_INFO_TAG AS PBIT ON PBIT.TAG_ID = BIT.TAG_PARENT_ID WHERE 1=1 order by
BI.BEIPIAOINFO_CREATE_TIME DESC
BI.BEIPIAOINFO_UPDATE_TIME DESC
limit ${firstResult},${rows}

SELECT b.* from cms_member_relation r join bp_info b ON r.relation_id = b.BEIPIAOINFO_ID and b.BEIPIAOINFO_STATUS = 1 WHERE r.member_id=#{id} and r.relation_type= 2
limit ${firstResult},${rows}
